title: game play, Vel'Koz is glitched
body:
Hello, I've just discovered that Ve'Koz is glitched. After I did an auto-attack it froze, same thing happened casting q and w, the champion freezes, however you can keep playing and casting spells, but its creepy.

1) After I Auto-attacked a minion, vel'Koz froze, but continued attacking
2) After casting q, vel'koz froze, but continued auto-attacking.
3) After casting w, Vel'koz froze, but continued auto-attacking.

This happened during 1 game, I haven´t played vel'koz anymore because of the glitch.

replies.body:
Hey Sylphyed,

Thanks for the detailed report! We're currently aware of this issue and are investigating.
